me"},{"lineNumber":104373,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うなって言うつもり？」","translatedEnglishLine":"not to fight?\""},{"lineNumber":104374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はリーザス親衛隊隊長で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am me.\""},{"lineNumber":104379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":104380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":104381,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何度でも言います」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll say it as many times as you need.\""},{"lineNumber":104382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕と結婚して下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please marry me.\""},{"lineNumber":104383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh!?\""},{"lineNumber":104384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そん……いま、きゅうに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-that's so... sudden... right now...\""},{"lineNumber":104385,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……ずるい」","translatedEnglishLine":"...that's unfair.\""},{"lineNumber":104386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、だって……いつもは、そんな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well... usually, it's me who's...\""},{"lineNumber":104387,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わたしがひっぱって……ええっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"leading... eh...\""},{"lineNumber":104388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「親衛隊隊長が替わる際の規則、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You do know the rule when changing the captain of the royal guards,"},{"lineNumber":104389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もちろんご存じですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"of course, don't you?\""},{"lineNumber":104390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦死するか、三十歳になるか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Either die in battle, or turn thirty...\""},{"lineNumber":104391,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結婚するまで隊長は替わらない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The captain doesn't change until they marry...\""},{"lineNumber":104392,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、だから、けっこんを……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-so, the marriage... is that why...?\""},{"lineNumber":104393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":104394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕は……貴方を愛しています。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... love you."},{"lineNumber":104395,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして、絶対に死なせたくありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"And I absolutely do not want you to die.\""},{"lineNumber":104396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、どうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So please...\""},{"lineNumber":104397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":104398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、わかりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I understand.\""},{"lineNumber":104399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私は剣を捨てます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I will lay down my sword.\""},{"lineNumber":104400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただし、それはこの戦争が終わってから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, that will be after this war is over.\""},{"lineNumber":104401,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハッキリと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Clearly,"},{"lineNumber":104402,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイラはリックの提案を断った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Leila rejected Rick's proposal."},{"lineNumber":104403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……レイラさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Leila-san\""},{"lineNumber":104404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふふ、ありがとうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hehe, thank you.\""},{"lineNumber":104405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「同じ剣士という立場上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As a fellow swordsman,"},{"lineNumber":104406,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方が剣を捨てろだなんて、簡単には言えない。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't easily tell you to lay down your sword."},{"lineNumber":104407,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと、それを言うまで沢山悩んだんでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely, you must have struggled a lot before saying that, right?\""},{"lineNumber":104408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":104409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方がそんな言葉を言うまでのことを考えると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thinking about what it took for you to say those words,"},{"lineNumber":104410,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、とても嬉しいわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm very happy.\""},{"lineNumber":104411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、私も剣士として、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But as a swordsman myself,"},{"lineNumber":104412,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これだけは絶対に譲れません」","translatedEnglishLine":"this is something I absolutely cannot compromise on.\""},{"lineNumber":104413,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},{"lineNumber":104414,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう言うと思っていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought you'd say that.\""},{"lineNumber":104415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then\""},{"lineNumber":104416,"originalJapaneseLine":"リックが背中の魔法剣バイ・ロードを抜く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rick drew the magical sword By Lord from his back."},{"lineNumber":104417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かめさせて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let me confirm it."},{"lineNumber":104418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レイラさんの実力……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Leila-san's skill...\""},{"lineNumber":104419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――結局私達は剣士だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—After all, since we're both swordsmen,"},{"lineNumber":104420,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これで会話した方が早いわよね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's faster to talk like this, isn't it...?\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...in this situation, are you telling me

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うなって言うつもり？」
「私はリーザス親衛隊隊長で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the captain of the Lizas Royal Guards,
and we are at war right now..."
"There's no way I could do something like that..."
"I'll say it as many times as you need."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わたしがひっぱって……ええっ……」
「親衛隊隊長が替わる際の規則、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You do know the rule when changing the captain of the royal guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんご存じですね」
「戦死するか、三十歳になるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Either die in battle, or turn thirty..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結婚するまで隊長は替わらない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The captain doesn't change until they marry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、絶対に死なせたくありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I absolutely do not want you to die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただし、それはこの戦争が終わってから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, that will be after this war is over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラはリックの提案を断った。
貴方が剣を捨てろだなんて、簡単には言えない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't easily tell you to lay down your sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと、それを言うまで沢山悩んだんでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely, you must have struggled a lot before saying that, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方がそんな言葉を言うまでのことを考えると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thinking about what it took for you to say those words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけは絶対に譲れません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is something I absolutely cannot compromise on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう言うと思っていました」
リックが背中の魔法剣バイ・ロードを抜く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rick drew the magical sword By Lord from his back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで会話した方が早いわよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's faster to talk like this, isn't it...?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
